gameDetails.name: Keyflower: Boat 7
gameDetails.description:
Keyflower: Boat 7 is a village tile for the game Keyflower. The tile was published in Q2 2018 exclusively through the BoardGameGeek store.

The rules for Boat 7 are as follows:

Boat 7a:  When obtaining resources or animals (KFF) from another player’s village, or at the end of a season from a turn order tile (KFF) or a boat (KFM), or from a contract (KFM), then the player may place these on any tile in their village.

Boat 7b:  At the end of summer, autumn, and winter, the owner receives one iron, one stone, and one wood onto their home tile from the general supply.

—description and update from the publisher
